results.content: Unbelievably thorough and deep. Truly a "mastery" course. Also, the instructor has an excellence cadence, clean teaching style, and enjoyable mannerisms. Best regards to you Kameswara.

results.content: The Author just showed the boilerplate. If he had shown adding three more props in interface then it will be good and will get clear understanding
results.content_html: The Author just showed the boilerplate. If he had shown adding three more props in interface then it will be good and will get clear understanding

results.content:
The course was informative as we get to know all the capabilities of SPFX what has to offer to users.
Downside of this course is some of the videos they are long even if its a simple thing for example - working with external API, the tutor could have covered all three videos in less than 10 mins each.
suggestion please minify the video length by avoiding explanations that were already given in previous videos, if required point to that video. In each video you can start with new project but do you think that whole thing(means showing yomen generator running to scaffold the project) has to be included in videos as well. 10 sec in each video then it will save 20 minutes. just saying to avoid repetitive things in all videos. Overall the course was good. I fast forwarded some as per my pace and it went well. Thanks
results.content_html:
The course was informative as we get to know all the capabilities of SPFX what has to offer to users.
Downside of this course is some of the videos they are long even if its a simple thing for example - working with external API, the tutor could have covered all three videos in less than 10 mins each.
suggestion please minify the video length by avoiding explanations that were already given in previous videos, if required point to that video. In each video you can start with new project but do you think that whole thing(means showing yomen generator running to scaffold the project) has to be included in videos as well. 10 sec in each video then it will save 20 minutes. just saying to avoid repetitive things in all videos. Overall the course was good. I fast forwarded some as per my pace and it went well. Thanks

results.content:
What I like is, that the teacher really takes a lot of time, to explain every single line of code which he uses. This is SO important. Also his background knowledge helps a bit to understand. But the structure does not fit to me. I would had need a basic introduction, what the philosophie of sharepoints really IS. (e.g. Making nearly everything over lists) 
Also the teacher pastes a bunch of code and then explains line by line. Liver writing would had help me to follow stepwise.
results.content_html:

results.content: Excellent course in SPFx. Well worth the money.
results.content_html: Excellent course in SPFx. Well worth the money.

results.content: Excellent instructor -- very patient with us going through every line of code, what it's doing and why it's built that way.  Goes through every gulp command and modality for deployment.  The combination of the thorough discussion with an equally exhaustive set of working code makes it very effective to actually learn it.  The course is very new so these are the latest and greatest  tools, so that helps too.
results.content_html: Excellent instructor -- very patient with us going through every line of code, what it's doing and why it's built that way. Goes through every gulp command and modality for deployment. The combination of the thorough discussion with an equally exhaustive set of working code makes it very effective to actually learn it. The course is very new so these are the latest and greatest tools, so that helps too.

results.content:
Learning SharePoint Framework SPFx development is great and i learn what i want. I was not have any prior knowledge about this course and after completion of the course i am confident to develop any application using SPFx.
Main feature of this course:
1. Content of this course is suitable from beginner  to expertise level.
2. Every aspect has been covered even fresher can also understand.
3. Instructor has good knowledge and experience about the course and  content.

results.content: Good
results.content_html: Good

results.content: First five sections were good to follow. Advanced concepts felt like a code walkthrough / reading code instead of explaining in detail why an interface is used or a module is imported. Could have been more better if real world examples are used instead of using examples already provided in Microsoft site. There should be some set of questions after each section to check our understanding levels.
results.content_html: First five sections were good to follow. Advanced concepts felt like a code walkthrough / reading code instead of explaining in detail why an interface is used or a module is imported. Could have been more better if real world examples are used instead of using examples already provided in Microsoft site. There should be some set of questions after each section to check our understanding levels.

results.content:
The content of the class seems to be very good, I have two main problems with it. One is minor, the other is actually major.

1/ Minor: You spend a little bit too much time repeating the same things. You can easily edit the course to be a little "tighter".

2/ Major: In some of the sections, so far in section 1 and Section 3, the sound quality it HORRENDOUS. In fact, if the sound quality continues to be as bad as it is, I am probably going to ask for a refund since the sound quality is giving me a headache.

response.content:
Hi Mr. Terje A Bergesen,

Sorry for the inconvenience caused and also thank you for notifying the same to us.

I do see the audio issue with Section 3,  but all remaining sections are absolutely perfect.

Hence, We will be replacing the audio with the new set of audio files, for section 3, in 3 days of time from today.

Happy Learning!

Regards
Kameswara Sarma U

Hi Terje A Bergesen,

I have re-recorded lectures of Section 3, to address the audio issue.
I have cross checked now all sections, and found things perfect.
Please go through Section 3 and let me have your review.
Regards
Kameswara Sarma U
response.content_html:
Hi Mr. Terje A Bergesen,

Sorry for the inconvenience caused and also thank you for notifying the same to us.

I have cross checked now all sections, and found things perfect.
Please go through Section 3 and let me have your review.

results.content_html:
The content of the class seems to be very good, I have two main problems with it. One is minor, the other is actually major.

1/ Minor: You spend a little bit too much time repeating the same things. You can easily edit the course to be a little "tighter".

2/ Major: In some of the sections, so far in section 1 and Section 3, the sound quality it HORRENDOUS. In fact, if the sound quality continues to be as bad as it is, I am probably going to ask for a refund since the sound quality is giving me a headache.
